    • Constructor Detail

      • CreatorWindow

        public CreatorWindow(String metroName,
             int width,
             int height)
        Creates the CanvasWindow used in creating the MetroCreator GUI. The GUI is created by instantiating a CanvasWindow object and adding the required Components. This class is rather messy as the basis of the CanvasGUI is absolute positioning and therefore could not be helped.
        Parameters:
        metroName - The System folder in which the Metro is located such as "/PSTMetro/Systems/metroName/"
        width - Width of the CreatorWindow
        height - Height of the CreatorWindow
        See Also:
        readMetroLines, readMetroNodes, readMetroConnections, readImages

    • Method Detail

      • addLineButtons

        public void addLineButtons(MetroLine line)
        Creates 2 CanvasButtons and adds them to the CanvasSidebar.
        These buttons are used to add MetroNodes to the corresponding MetroLine.
        Parameters:
        line - The MetroLine used to get the Color of the button and create nodes associated with this line.

      • removeLineButtons

        public void removeLineButtons(MetroLine ml)
        Parameters:
        ml - The MetroLine to remove the associated CanvasButtons from the CanvasSidebar.
